translation: For him, there is no interest whatsoever in what is done or not done; nor does he depend on any being for any purpose.
commentary: 3.18 Not not? Eve even? his of hi? by action? Meaning: concern? Not not? Akritena by actions not done? Ih here? Someone any? Not not? f and? of this man? in all beings in all beings? Someone any? Arthavyapasrayah depending for any object.Commentary The sage who is thus rejoicing in the Self does not gain anything by doing any action. For him there really is no purpose served by an action. No evil (Pratyavaya
